SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class ProfileManager

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.ProfileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProfileManager extends Object implements Serializable
Responsible for managing the database of student profiles and high score tables.

Includes methods to add, edit, or remove student profiles. Any changes made to the student profiles will automatically update the high score tables and write the changes to file.
Author:
Joelene Hales
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileManager

      public ProfileManager(String studentInformationFilename, String highScoreFilename, String lifetimeScoreFilename)
      Constructor loads and stores all student profiles and high scores.
      Parameters:
      studentInformationFilename - Filename of JSON file storing student profiles.
      highScoreFilename - Filename of JSON file storing the students with the highest achieved individual game scores.
      lifetimeScoreFilename - Filename of JSON file storing the students with the highest overall lifetime scores.

  • Method Details

    • getStudentProfiles

      public ArrayList<PlayerProfile> getStudentProfiles()
      Returns a list of all student profiles.
      Returns:
      List of all student profiles.

    • getHighScoreList

      public ArrayList<PlayerProfile> getHighScoreList()
      Returns the top 5 students with the highest achieved individual game scores. Students are sorted from highest to lowest score.
      Returns:
      Students with the highest achieved individual game scores.

    • getLifetimeHighScoreList

      public ArrayList<PlayerProfile> getLifetimeHighScoreList()
      Returns the top 5 students with the highest overall lifetime scores. Students are sorted from highest to lowest score.
      Returns:
      Students with the highest overall lifetime scores.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(String name) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new student profile and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the entered name already exists.

    • removeStudent

      public PlayerProfile removeStudent(String name) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deletes an existing student's profile and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      Returns:
      Profile removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the entered name does not exist.

    • renameStudent

      public void renameStudent(String name, String newName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Renames the student with the given name and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      newName - New name of student.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the student to be renamed does not exist.

    • changeKnowledgeLevel

      public void changeKnowledgeLevel(String name, int newKnowledgeLevel) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Changes the knowledge level of a student and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      newKnowledgeLevel - New knowledge level of student.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the entered name does not exist.
      NumberFormatException - If a negative knowledge level is given

    • updateHighScore

      public void updateHighScore(String name, int newHighScore) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates the high score of a student and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      newHighScore - Student's new high score.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the entered name does not exist.

    • updateLifetimeScore

      public void updateLifetimeScore(String name, int newScore) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds to the student's lifetime score and writes updates to the database files.
      Parameters:
      name - Student's name.
      newScore - Individual game score to add to lifetime score.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a student with the entered name does not exist.
